Package index

Plot functions

nba_plot()
NBA plot function
nba_plot_comb()
NBA multi plot function
nba_index_plot()
NBA index plot function
nba_plot_bubble()
Bubble plot
nba_plot_theme()
NBA theme for a ggplot object
nba_pressure_bar_plot()
horizontal bar plot of pressures

Table functions

nba_tbl()
Basic NBA table
nba_tbl_colr()
Coloured table
nba_tbl_theme()
gt table theme
nba_tbl_comb()
Table of protection level of threatened ecosystems.

Map functions

nba_map()
NBA map function

Quarto functions

nba_init_quarto_docs()
Create template quarto documents to get an NBA html page up and running
nba_init_quarto_proj()
Create template quarto project to get an NBA html page up and running
nba_citation()
NBA citation function

Built in datasets

NBA_example_thr_data
NBA ecosystem type threat status data
NBA_example_pro_data
NBA ecosystem type protection level data
NBA_example_comb_data
NBA combined ecosystem type protection level and threat level example data
NBA_example_bubble_data
NBA bubble example data
NBA_example_press_bar_data
NBA pressure bar plot example data
NBA_example_rlis_data
NBA index data (RLIs taxon)
NBA_example_rlie_data
NBA index data (RLIe)
NBA_example_epli2018_data
NBA index data (EPLI 2018)
NBA_example_epli2024_data
NBA index data (EPLI 2024)
NBA_example_map_data
NBA map example data, mem (marine ecosystem map) 2023
NBA_categories
NBA category words/ phrases used in threat status/ protection level/ and condition categorisation
NBA_colours
NBA colours for every category
